title: i got low priority que when i shouldn't have
body:
My friend, who i duo'd with, and was in a call with dc'd and was back before minions spawned.
I was waiting at red, setting up boxes.
someone started the /remake after he came back, and someone said yes so it went to the "defeat" scenario
bam, 5 low priority ques for me for some reason.
fix it

replies.body: Being inactive for 90 seconds or more within the first 3 minutes of the game will result in being flagged by the /Remake system and a remake will become available at the 3:00 mark. Going inactive to check on something outside of game can leave your team behind, and it's not fair to your teammates. Low priority queues are only given when there is a trend of disconnections from matches. If you're disconnecting often, please let me know and I'll do my best to assist you in troubleshooting the issue.

it needs to be fixed. we were both in out lane before minions spawned.
also, he didn't get punished whatsoever and i left spawn pool before he reconnected even...
It isn't broken. If you got a penalty it's because you were idle too long. Do not wait on your friend, go play the game so  your team doesn't get further behind.

I'm sorry but leaving spawn pool just before 1 minute isn't "idle too long" (58 seconds so i could message him because he dcd from curse. maybe it was 1min 2 seconds after buying items but nah it's broken)
... it is broken. we were both in lane before they decided to remake and i couldn't even say like, "hey, we're here don't remake"
I'm literally about to abuse this issue every chance I can just to be an arse face. (:
it's pretty unfair that I got a penalty when he didn't and i wasn't afk at all.

If you didn't start until he came back, then you would be considered afk too. Please do not sit idle when another player doesn't connect, because you will be punished as an afk'er as well when the /remake happens.
